Management Commands¶

Query¶

export_queries¶

Export queries and associated metadata of selected users.

export_stopwords¶

Export stopwords of selected users.

gatherstatistics¶

Gather statistics of the total number of documents per day and put them in the database.

zipquerydata¶

Management command for creating a zipfile of a set of documents (query export).

Services¶

gatherdocids¶

Gather document ids of documents in the index and store them in the database. The collection of document ids is used for testing ElasticSearch performance on term aggregations (command: esperformance).

gatherqueryterms¶

Gather query terms and store them in the database. The collection of terms is used for testing ElasticSearch performance on weighted queries (command: weighted_queries).

esperformance¶

Generate word clouds based on words added as tags for random sets of documents.

termvector_wordclouds¶

Generate word clouds based on termvectors for random sets of documents.

tv_wc_no_client¶

Generate word clouds based on termvectors for random sets of documents.

weighted_queries¶

Perform searches with random weighted queries in ElasticSearch.
